title: Here’s a peek inside Beto O’Rourke’s Rally Against Fear (and President Trump’s rally too)
text:
OK, we’ll admit the crowd for Beto O’Rourke’s “Rally Against Fear” grew quite a bit since we checked in earlier Thursday, and while a line did form around the building in Grand Prairie, is it OK to say that we see an awful lot of white people there? We wouldn’t call the diversity “incredible.”

The diversity of this crowd compared to a trump hate rally. It’s incredible!#RallyAgainstFear #Beto2020 https://t.co/JSA0aidgVQ — Paychecko (@Paychecko) October 17, 2019

The only reason we’re coming back to O’Rourke at all is because of this amazing footage of one of the warm-up acts (language warning):

If you’re not at Beto’s #RallyAgainstFear, here’s a taste of what you’re missing pic.twitter.com/QX1PxCjHmr — Tom Elliott (@tomselliott) October 18, 2019

I wonder who canceled — Stephe96 (@Stephe96) October 18, 2019

Looks riveting. — Jim (@strudel_king) October 18, 2019

Sounds like a rally against lyrics. — Phiłip Kennedy ₿&Ł🔑 (@KennedyFinance) October 18, 2019

I just gained a new appreciation for Lee Greenwood. — Eusebius Rex (@Eusebius_Rex) October 18, 2019

I'd rather watch paint dry. — (((Val Washington)))🇺🇸❤ (@ValeriaPugliesi) October 18, 2019

I'd rather watch Robert's band play — Daedalus 2.0 (@RonSwandive) October 18, 2019

Well, since you requested it, here’s O’Rourke playing the drums in his basement.

How @BetoORourke is getting pumped for the Democratic debates tonight. pic.twitter.com/MUWH48X3IG — Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) September 12, 2019

LMAO 😊 "Bitch I am the art show" — Zach Wells 🇺🇸 (@WellzZach) October 18, 2019

Calling women bitcches and hoes is so feminist @BetoORourke — Peoples Champ (@Hurricaneheat1) October 18, 2019

“Bitch, I am the art show” does sound like something Beto would say. — Mark Ripollone (@MarkRipollone) October 18, 2019

Nobody’s missing that. — Candy Lamb (@candylamb47) October 18, 2019

I couldn't even watch the whole thing, yes its that bad. — Amberlyn_Bot (@Amberlyn_R) October 18, 2019

All the excitement of a DMV waiting room. — 🇺🇸Night "Scary Memes” Wood✞⚭⚓ (@Shteina_Gott) October 18, 2019

Wonder when they drag out the prop coffee shop counter for him to stand on.

Oh, and over at Trump’s hate rally in Dallas:

#TrumpRally in Dallas has now reached capacity. All entrances closed at 7:30pm CST. pic.twitter.com/2ZZKRopuIo — Chanel Rion OAN (@ChanelRion) October 18, 2019

BETO: Trump is not welcome in Texas! TEXAS: pic.twitter.com/NfMibYQNQ1 — ForAmerica (@ForAmerica) October 18, 2019

Democrats: Texas is going Blue in 2020 Texas: pic.twitter.com/iToxqcBXmO — Benny (@bennyjohnson) October 18, 2019

Wonder when the Rally Against Fear tour hits Iowa, where O’Rourke’s polling below 2 percent?

Related:
description: If you were wondering what a rally against fear looked like, here's a peek.
